Name: Vanilla & Grapefruit Daiquiri
Ingredients: 50 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist.
EXPRESS grapefruit zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Reminiscent of a Hemingway Special , this citrusy, vanilla-laced Daiquiri has a tangy bittersweet finish.
History: Created in 2003 by yours truly in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Vanilla & Grapefruit Daiquiri contains 168 calories
